Vibe Coding Workshop using Copilot.description: Learn how to use GitHub Copilot to enhance your coding workflow with AI assistance.

AI/ML History Kahoot.description: Test your knowledge of AI and machine learning history in this interactive Kahoot session.

AI/ML Student Panel.description: Student panel discussion in collaboration with Trefny Honor Center.

Intro to Kaggle Workshop.description: Get started with Kaggle competitions and learn how to build and submit your first ML model.

Sustainability Debate and Lecture.description: Explore the intersection of AI/ML and sustainability through debate and discussion.

Guest Speaker: Justin Kilb.description: Industry guest speaker Justin Kilb shares insights on AI/ML in practice.

AI/ML Club Celebration and Website-Makin.description: Join us for a celebration and presentations from the website-making competition!

AI/ML Learning Event.description: Collaborative learning event with Trefny Honor Center focused on AI and machine learning.

LLM Workshop using Ollama.description: Hands-on workshop exploring large language models using Ollama for local deployment.

Mentorship Program Launch.description: Connect with industry professionals for mentorship opportunities in AI and machine learning. Details coming soon!

CU Denver Data Science Symposium.description: Collaborative data science symposium with CU Denver. Details to be announced.
